$comment: VS Code Extension Configuration Contract for Markdown Reader
description: Defines user-configurable settings for the Markdown Reader extension

markdownReader.enabled.description: Enable the Markdown Reader extension. When disabled, markdown files open in standard VS Code editor mode.

markdownReader.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns for files and folders to exclude from auto-preview. Files matching these patterns will open in standard editor mode.

markdownReader.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes for auto-preview (default: 1MB = 1048576). Files larger than this will open in editor mode with an info message.

notes.defaultBehavior: With default settings, the extension works immediately after installation. All markdown files open in preview mode except those in node_modules or .git directories.
notes.workspaceOverride: All settings support workspace-level override via .vscode/settings.json
